src:
Ura na tržnici spet kaže čas
04 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Uredništvo

Koprsko tržnico že od začetka devetdesetih let prejšnjega stoletja krasi ura, ki je bila v zadnjem obdobju res samo še za okras, saj ni kazala časa.



Ura na koprski tržnici spet deluje. 

KOPER > Žarka Živca je to, tako kot marsikaterega Koprčana, zbodlo in zadal si je, da jo bo popravil oziroma da bo to na lastne stroške naredilo njegovo podjetje Technobell.
Z upravljalcem tržnice so se dogovorili še, da jo bodo v prihodnjih letih sami vzdrževali. Za popravilo pa gre največ zaslug Marinu Bradašu, ki je v Technobellu zaposlen kot tehnolog elektrotehnik.
text:
The clock in the market again shows time
04 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Uredništvo

The Koper market has been adorned with a clock since the beginning of the 1990s, which in the recent period was really just for decoration, since it did not show time.



The clock in the Koper market is working again.

KOPER> Like many Koprcans, Zarko Zivko had a problem and he set himself to repair it or that his Technobell company would do it at his own expense.
They also agreed with the market manager to maintain it in the coming years. Most of the credit goes to Marin Bradas, who is a techno-technologist at Technobell.
